channel.title: [11.0.0.3.0-stable, PhyIso] Build error
channel.description:
Hi! I just wanted to install Whonix and I've read this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/Physical_Isolation Unfortunately I couldn't build it so I tried to search some information and found this: https://www.whonix.org/old-forum/index.php?topic=1889.0 It didn't help. :/
Here is the log (first 500 lines removed due to limit):

item.title: [11.0.0.3.0-stable, PhyIso] Build error
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
keel:

12.0.0.3.2-developers-only? There is no 12.0.0.3.2-stable when I type “git tag”.

Has been forgotten. Has now been blessed stable. Will fix some time. Use
it anyhow.

“git clean -dff”: would remove: packages/qxl-xorg-enhance, sdwdate-gui and security-misc.

what shall I do? :x

If there are no private files within the Whonix source code folder, ones
you added yourself, it should be safe.

See also:

./help-steps/cleanup-files

Read full topic

item.description:
For starters, don’t use Whonix 11. Use Whonix 12.

item.dc:creator: keel
item.description:
Hi!
I just wanted to install Whonix and I’ve read this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/Physical_Isolation
Unfortunately I couldn’t build it so I tried to search some information and found this: https://www.whonix.org/old-forum/index.php?topic=1889.0
It didn’t help.
